amendment.description: To limit the period during which appropriations may be made to carry out this Act and to create a point of order in the Senate against any appropriation to carry out this Act that exceeds the amount authorized for fiscal year 2013.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5082 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 28 - 67. Record Vote Number: 180.

action.text: Amendment SA 5082 proposed by Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S6692-6693; text: CR S6692) To limit the period during which appropriations may be made to carry out this Act and to create a point of order in the Senate against any appropriation to carry out this Act that exceeds the amount authorized for fiscal year 2013.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5082 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 28 - 67. Record Vote Number: 180.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5082 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 28 - 67. Record Vote Number: 180.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5082 proposed by Senator Kyl.
